body {
min-width: 1085px;
}
.content-outer, .content-fauxcolumn-outer, .region-inner {
min-width: 1085px;
max-width: 1085px;
_width: 1085px;
}
.main-inner .columns {
padding-left: 0;
padding-right: 500px;
}
.main-inner .fauxcolumn-center-outer {
left: 0;
right: 500px;
/* IE6 does not respect left and right together */
_width: expression(this.parentNode.offsetWidth -
parseInt("0") -
parseInt("500px") + 'px');
}
.main-inner .fauxcolumn-left-outer {
width: 0;
}
.main-inner .fauxcolumn-right-outer {
width: 500px;
}
.main-inner .column-left-outer {
width: 0;
right: 100%;
margin-left: -0;
}
.main-inner .column-right-outer {
width: 500px;
margin-right: -500px;
}
#layout {
min-width: 0;
}
#layout .content-outer {
min-width: 0;
width: 800px;
}
#layout .region-inner {
min-width: 0;
width: auto;
}
--&gt;
  </style>

   var a="indexOf",b="&amp;m=1",e="(^|&amp;)m=",f="?",g="?m=1";function h(){var c=window.location.href,d=c.split(f);switch(d.length){case 1:return c+g;case 2:return 0&lt;=d[1].search(e)?null:c+b;default:return null}}var k=navigator.userAgent;if(-1!=k[a]("Mobile")&amp;&amp;-1!=k[a]("WebKit")&amp;&amp;-1==k[a]("iPad")||-1!=k[a]("Opera Mini")||-1!=k[a]("IEMobile")){var l=h();l&amp;&amp;window.location.replace(l)};
  </script>

   if (window.jstiming) window.jstiming.load.tick('headEnd');
  </script>

     function setAttributeOnload(object, attribute, val) {
      if(window.addEventListener) {
        window.addEventListener('load',
          function(){ object[attribute] = val; }, false);
      } else {
        window.attachEvent('onload', function(){ object[attribute] = val; });
      }
    }
    </script>

              <div class="widget Blog" id="Blog1">
               <div class="blog-posts hfeed">
                <!-- google_ad_section_start(name=default) -->
                <div class="date-outer">
                 <h2 class="date-header">
                  <span>
                   Thursday, November 7, 2013
                  </span>
                 </h2>
                 <div class="date-posts">
                  <div class="post-outer">
                   <div class="post hentry" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting">
                    <a name="1440287004982192486">
                    </a>
                    <h3 class="post-title entry-title" itemprop="name">
                     A Virtual Tour of the Globe Theater
                    </h3>
                    <div class="post-header">
                     <div class="post-header-line-1">
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="post-body entry-content" id="post-body-1440287004982192486" itemprop="description articleBody">
                     <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
                      <a href="http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--dW0VCdjO70/Unu6I4nvRCI/AAAAAAAAeNg/LHyPsr0UrSY/s1600/shakespeare-67698_640.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;">
                       <img border="0" height="200" src="http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--dW0VCdjO70/Unu6I4nvRCI/AAAAAAAAeNg/LHyPsr0UrSY/s200/shakespeare-67698_640.jpg" width="155"/>
                      </a>
                     </div>
                     Back in May I shared
                     <a href="http://www.freetech4teachers.com/2013/05/5-good-resources-for-teaching-learning.html" target="_blank">
                      five good resources
                     </a>
                     for teaching and learning about Shakespeare. Last night through
                     <a href="http://www.openculture.com/2013/11/take-a-virtual-tour-of-shakespeares-globe-theatre.html" target="_blank">
                      Open Culture
                     </a>
                     I learned of another resource to add to that list. Shakespeare's Globe offers a
                     <a href="http://www.shakespearesglobe.com/about-us/virtual-tour" target="_blank">
                      four part virtual tour of the Globe Theater
                     </a>
                     . The tour is built on the work of graphic designers who built a model of the original theater. You can
                     <a href="http://www.shakespearesglobe.com/about-us/virtual-tour" target="_blank">
                      find the tour here
                     </a>
                     . You will need to install the Quicktime browser plug-in in order to experience the tour.
                     <br/>
                     <br/>
                     <div style="clear: both;">
                     </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="post-footer">
                     <div class="post-footer-line post-footer-line-1">
                      <span class="post-author vcard">
                      </span>
                      <span class="post-timestamp">
                       at
                       <a class="timestamp-link" href="http://www.freetech4teachers.com/2013/11/a-virtual-tour-of-globe-theater.html" itemprop="url" rel="bookmark" title="permanent link">
                        <abbr class="published" itemprop="datePublished" title="2013-11-07T11:29:00-05:00">
                         11:29 AM
                        </abbr>
                       </a>
                      </span>
                      <span class="post-comment-link">
                      </span>

                        </a>
                       </span>

                         <img alt="" class="icon-action" height="18" src="//img2.blogblog.com/img/icon18_edit_allbkg.gif" width="18"/>
                        </a>

                       </a>

                        <g:plusone annotation="inline" href="http://www.freetech4teachers.com/2013/11/a-virtual-tour-of-globe-theater.html" size="medium" source="blogger:blog:plusone" width="300">
                        </g:plusone>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="post-footer-line post-footer-line-2">

                    <div class="widget-content">
                     <script type="text/javascript">
                      var addthis_config = {"data_track_addressbar":true};
                     </script>
                     <script src="http://s7.addthis.com/js/250/addthis_widget.js#pubid=rbyrnetech" type="text/javascript">
                     </script>
                     <script type="text/javascript">
                      document.doAT = function(cl)
{
        var myclass = new RegExp('hentry');
        var myTitleContainer = new RegExp('post-title');
        var myPostContent = new RegExp('post-footer');
        var elem = this.getElementsByTagName('div');
        for (var i = 0; i &lt; elem.length; i++)
        {
            var classes = elem[i].className;
            if (myclass.test(classes))
            {                var container = elem[i];
                for (var b = 0; b &lt; container.childNodes.length; b++)
                {
                    var item = container.childNodes[b].className;
                    if (myTitleContainer.test(item))
                    {
                        var link = container.childNodes[b].getElementsByTagName('a');
                        if (typeof(link[0]) != 'undefined')
                        {
                            var url = link[0].href;
                            var title = link[0].innerHTML;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            var url = document.url;
                            var title =  container.childNodes[b].innerHTML;
                        }
                        if (typeof(url) == 'undefined'|| url == 'undefined' ){
                            url = window.location.href;
                        }
                    var singleq = new RegExp("'", 'g');
                    var doubleq = new RegExp('"', 'g');                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                    title = title.replace(singleq, '&#39;', 'gi');
                    title = title.replace(doubleq, '&#34;', 'gi');

                    }
                    if (myPostContent.test(item))
                    {
                        var footer = container.childNodes[b];
                    }
                }
                var n = document.createElement('div');
                var at = "&lt;div class='addthis_toolbox addthis_default_style ' addthis:title='"+title+"' addthis:url='"+encodeURI(url)+"'   &gt; &lt;a class='addthis_button_facebook_like' fb:like:layout='button_count'&gt;&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a class='addthis_button_tweet'&gt;&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a class='addthis_button_pinterest_pinit'&gt;&lt;/a&gt; &lt;a class='addthis_counter addthis_pill_style'&gt;&lt;/a&gt; &lt;/div&gt; ";
                n.innerHTML = at;
                container.insertBefore(n , footer);
            }
        }
    return true;
};

document.doAT('hentry');
                     </script>
                    </div>
